parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.66
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>global
</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets vehicle and instigator pair for the given projectile.
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> projectile [[setShotParents]] [vehicle, instigator]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> projectile: [[Object]] - the actual projectile shot
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [vehicle, instigator]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - Vehicle shooting projectile
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> instigator: [[Object]] - Person pulling the trigger

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myProjectile [[setShotParents]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] bob, bob];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>tank [[addEventHandler]] ["Fired", {_this [[select]] 6 [[setShotParents]] [tank, [[commander]] tank]}];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getShotParents]]
</value></part></template>
